name: Host
description: An instance of a computer operating system, almost always networked. Distinct from Machine.

name: VPC
description: Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) enables you to launch resources (hosts) into a virtual network that you've defined. This virtual network closely resembles a traditional network operating in a data center

name: Subnet
description: A subnet is a logical grouping of connected network devices that tend to be located in close physical proximity to each other.
